requirements.text: Match F-16 Fighting Falcon geometry: ≈15 m length, 10 m wingspan, single-seat cockpit.
Provide Mach 2 dash capability with sustained 9 g maneuver envelope.
Integrate an F100/F110 class augmented turbofan with afterburner throttle control.
Carry at least 3,100 kg of internal fuel with 8% reserve margin for recovery.
Provide full HOTAS pilot controls, digital fly-by-wire channels, and autopilot hold modes.
Support multirole loadouts across nine hardpoints with mission computer stores management.
It should be an unstable aircraft, the control loop should compensate for this.
